verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> lovers of <S%G5367>self<s%>, lovers of <S%G5366>money<s%>, <S%G213>boastful<s%>, <S%G5244>haughty<s%>, <S%G989>railers<s%>, <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents<s%>, <S%G884>unthankful<s%>, <S%G462>unholy<s%>,
without natural <S%G794>affection<s%>, <S%G786>implacable<s%>, <S%G1228>slanderers<s%>, without <S%G193>self-control<s%>, <S%G434>fierce<s%>, no lovers of <S%G865>good<s%>,
traitors <S%G4273><s%>, <S%G4312>headstrong<s%>, <S%G5187>puffed<s%> <S%G5369>up<s%>, lovers of pleasure <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> lovers of <S%G5377>God<s%>;

holding <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> having <S%G720>denied<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%>: <S%G665>from<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> also turn <S%G665>away<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they that <S%G1744>creep<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3614>houses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> take <S%G162>captive<s%> silly <S%G1133>women<s%> <S%G4987>laden<s%> with <S%G266>sins<s%>, led <S%G71>away<s%> by <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>,

But <S%G235><s%> they shall <S%G4298>proceed<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4119>further<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G454>folly<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1552>evident<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5613>men<s%>, as <S%G1565>theirs<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> came to <S%G1096>be<s%>.

persecutions <S%G1375><s%>, <S%G3804>sufferings<s%>. <S%G3634>What<s%> things <S%G1096>befell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%>, <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%>; <S%G3634>what<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%> I <S%G5297>endured<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hast been assured <S%G4104>of<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> thou hast learned <S%G3129>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> a <S%G1025>babe<s%> thou hast <S%G1492>known<s%> the <S%G2413>sacred<s%> <S%G1121>writings<s%> which are <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4679>make<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G4679>wise<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

Every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> inspired of <S%G2315>God<s%> is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1319>teaching<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1650>reproof<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1882>correction<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3809>instruction<s%> which is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.
